/*input
2
3 3
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8 9
4 2
1 2
3 2147483647
4 2147483647
2147483647 2147483647
*/

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define PII pair<ll, ll>
#define f first
#define s second
#define F(i,a,b) for(ll i = (ll)(a); i <= (ll)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(ll i = (ll)(a); i >= (ll)(b); i--)
#define X 2147483647

ll t, m, n, c;
int main() 
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>m>>n;
		ll arr[m+1][n+1];
		F(i,0,m)
			F(j,0,n)
				arr[i][j]=X;
		F(i,0,m-1)
			F(j,0,n-1)
				cin>>arr[i][j];
		c=0;
		ll i=0, j=0;
		while(1)
		{
			if(arr[i+1][j]==arr[i][j+1])
				break;
			if(arr[i+1][j]<arr[i][j+1])
				i++;
			else
				j++;
			c++;
		}
		cout<<c<<endl;
	}	
    return 0;
}
